st: Ab Jo Tu Mujhe Fansata Hai,
s:
Ab Jo Tu Mujhe Fansata Hai,
Bata Eh Sayyaad,
Kuchh Agle Giraftar,
Riha Huye Hain Ke Nahin,

st: Hosh Hi Jaate Rahen,
s:
Hosh Hi Jaate Rahen,
Toh Aadmi Kya Kar Sake,
Dekh Lu Jab Unki Surat,
Main Karu Toh Kya Karun,

st: Kuchh Hosh Ho Toh,
s:
Kuchh Hosh Ho Toh,
Daag Ko Samjhayein Neko Band,
Duba Hua Hai,
Nasha E Jaam E Sharab Mein…

st: Jam Eh Pak Is Jamane Ke,
s:
Jam Eh Pak Is Jamane Ke,
Haay Jalse Sharab Khane Ke,

Jikar Bekayda Na Kar Vaaij,
Us Jamane Mein Us Jamane Mein,

Bark Funke Udaye Baade Khija,
Char Tinake Hain Aashiyane Ke,

Tukhme Ulfat Se Hai Vafure Ashk,
Laakh Dane Hai Ek Daane Ke,

Ahle Jannat Ke Bhi Dilo Pe Daag,
Naksh Hain Is Nigarkhane Ke…

st: Vaaij Bada Maja Ho Agar Yun Saja Ho
s:
Vaaij Bada Maja Ho Agar Yun Saja Ho
Narak Mein Paanv,

Haath Mein Jaam E Sharab Ho,
Maashuk Ka Toh Jurm Ho Aasiq Kharab Ho,

Koi Kare Gunah Kisi Par Ajab Ho,
Tu Mujhpe Fida Ho Mujhe Ijatnaab Ho,

Ya Inklab Ho Toh Bada Inklab Ho,
Duniya Mein Kya Rakha Hai,

Kyamat Mein Lutf Ho,
Mera Jawab Ho Na Tumhara Jawab Ho…

st: Parde Parde Mein Adab Achhe Nahi,
s:
Parde Parde Mein Adab Achhe Nahi,
Aise Andaaje Hjab Achhe Nahin,

Maykade Mein Ho Gaye Chupchap Kyu,
Aaj Kuchh Maste Sharab Achhe Nahin,

Eh Falak Kyahai Jamane Ki Bisat,
Dam B Dam Ke Inklaab Achhe Nahin,

Touba Kar Lein Hum May O Maashuk Se,
Bemaja Hain Yeh Savab Achhe Nahin,

Ek Najumi Daag Se Kahta Tha Aaj,
Aapke Din E Janab Achhe Nahi Hain

st: Saki Main Badkismat Nahin De Sakunga,
s:
Saki Main Badkismat Nahin De Sakunga,
Aaj Kimat Teri Is Sarab Ki,

Gham Mein Pi Rahe The Us Se Achhi Hai,
Aaj Niyat Teri Is Saraab Ki,

Pi Jab Kabhi Saraab Humne ,
Unki Masti Bhari Nigahon Se ,

Chal Padhte Hain Uske Ghar Ko,
Uthhkar Apni Rahon Se…

st: Nasha Hum Karte Hai,
s:
Nasha Hum Karte Hai,
Ilzam Sharab ko Milta Hai,
Magar Ilzam Sharab Ka Nahi Unka Hai,
Jinka Chehra Ham Har Jam Me Nazar Ata Hai…

st: Mahekta hua jism tera gulaab jaisa hai,
s:
Mahekta hua jism tera gulaab jaisa hai,
neend k safar mein tu khwaab jaisa hai,
do ghoo.nt pee lene de aankhon ki mastiya,
nasha teri aankhon ka sharab ke jaam jaisa hai…

st: Uski Bezaar-E-Bad Dua Mein Hayaat Meri
s:
Uski Bezaar-E-Bad Dua Mein Hayaat Meri
Gujarne Lagi Maikhane Mein Kahi

Hume Malaamat Mili Saki Ke
Shamil Hue Tere Shab E Maikhane Mein

Tere Dard-E-Gham Mein Dil E Zauq-E-Talab
Ab Na Koi Tanhai Rahi Na Kisika Khuloos-E-Qalb

Jam-E-Sharab Hardum Chalkta Gayaa
Tarz-E-Tapaak Main Sharabi Pita Gayaa

Woh Samjhe Ke Barbaad Hue Hum
Kaise Kahu O Bewafa Maikhane Se Roshan Hue Hain Hum

st: Tanhai Iss Tarah Barsi
s:
Tanhai Iss Tarah Barsi
Ke Gham-E-Ishq Mein Jam-E-Sharab Pee Gaya

Tere Intezar Mein Arsa-E-Hastee
Gard-E-Gham Taras Khaa Ke Pee Gayaa

Dil Kii Dharkan Mein Teri Yaadein Bikhar Gayee
Bujh Gai Roshni Meri Jab Terii Raan’aaii Chali Gayii

Dil Ki Bebsi Meri Koi Tawaazun Na Rahi
Bhool Gaya Sara Jamana ‘Sheikh’ Woh Mujko Chhod Gayii

st: Kya Pata Tha Hayaat Meri Maikhane Se Gujregi Kabhi
s:
Kya Pata Tha Hayaat Meri Maikhane Se Gujregi Kabhi
Dard-E-Tanhai Mein Jam-E-Sharab Pyass Bujhati Rahi
Marhale Ishq-E-Muhobatt Ke Nashaakashii Mein Pi Gaye
Hai Chashm-E-Gunahagaar Dasht-E-Tanhai Manzil Meri Ganwati Rahi
Mili Tou Woh Aise Ke Ek Ajnabee Mehfil Se Uthi
Har Makaam Par Unki Nafrat Se Nigahe Humse Churati Rahi
Woh Kya Samjhee Barbad-E-Muhobatt Ki Dua Lagi Humei
Hum Woh Majnu Hai ‘Sheikh’ Pite Hai Tou Apne Saya Ko Bhi Pilate Rahe…

st: Teri Awaj Tabaah-E-Dil Mein Goonj Uthi
s:
Teri Awaj Tabaah-E-Dil Mein Goonj Uthi
Jb Chalakta Jam Honton Se Laga

Magrabi Hawa Phir Se Chalee
Zahar-E-Gham Ka Nasha Honae Laga

Boond Boond Sharab Mein Nazar-E-Tasveer Dekhi
Kasm-E-Waade Mein Sheikh Shiddat-E-Gam Pita Hi Raha

st: Hayaat-E-Safar Mein Guzr Gaya Woh Muqam
s:
Hayaat-E-Safar Mein Guzr Gaya Woh Muqam
Ranj-O-Musiibat Simat Kar Mere Daman Se Gire

Chaman Ke Phool Khiza Mein Ab Kya Khile Hain
Ke Rishta-E-Ulfat Dhua Ban Kar Barish Se Gire

Silsila-E-Ishq Mein Uzr-E-Jafaa De Na Sakae
Nighae Milli Unse To Ghaayal Mehfil Mein Gire

Vaqt-E-Rukhsat Door Nahi Tisnagi Tujse Mit Gayee
Akhari Sanse Khuvaar Hui Sheikh Jam-E-Sharab Pee Ke Gire

st: Gham-E-Dil Mein Dard-E-Tamanna Sulagti Rahi
s:
Gham-E-Dil Mein Dard-E-Tamanna Sulagti Rahi
Hum Ghamkharon Ka Anjaam Maikhane Mein Sahi
Khuda Ab Tu Pila De Jane Kya Hashar Hai Hamara
Tune Piyas Bujhai Hamari Sharab Qaabil-E-Raham Rahi…

st: Sakii Dum Se Tere Chalte Rahe Maikhane,
s:
Sakii Dum Se Tere Chalte Rahe Maikhane,
Mere Pine Se Toote Rahe Paimane-Paimane,
Tere Naaam Se Chalti Dil-E-Dhadkane Meri,
Taufiiq-E-Nazar Sharab Mein Surat Hai Teri…

st: Jahaan-E-Wafaa Khai Chot, Tere Ishq Mein Kaisi Maine
s:
Jahaan-E-Wafaa Khai Chot, Tere Ishq Mein Kaisi Maine
Ke Ab Jam-E-Sharab Mein, Gire Dou Aansu Ke Sailab Mere
Shab-E-Visaal Arzu-E-Tamanna, Nigahe Muntazir Hai Mere
Ab Na Gam-E-Naakhudaa Mujhe, Khud Ko Mita Kar Tu Mil Hi Gai

st: Muddat Sey Chaha Hey Tumhain, Zakhm-E-Tamanna Dil-E-Nishat
s:
Muddat Sey Chaha Hey Tumhain, Zakhm-E-Tamanna Dil-E-Nishat
Daagh-E-Firaaq Dil-E-Nadaan Kismat Se Churaya Hai Aitbaar
Nazzaara-E-Jamaal Muzda-E-Wisaal Lafzon Ke Fasaane Bar_Bar
Tu Zehr De Na Jam-E-Sharab Mujeh_De Ijaazat-E-Tasleem-E-Yaar

st: Log Toot Jaate Hain Ek Ghar Bnane Mein
s:
Log Toot Jaate Hain Ek Ghar Bnane Mein
Tum Tarsh Nahi Khate Bastiyan Jalane Mein

Aur Jaam Tuteinge Is Sharabkhane Mein
Mausamo Ke Aane Mein Mausamo Ke Jaane Mein

Har Dhadkate Pathar Ko Log Dil Samajhte Hain
Umar Beet Jaati Hai Dil Ko Dil Bnane Mein

Fakhta Ki Majboori Ye Bhi Nahi Keh Sakti
Kaun Saanp Rakhta Hai Uske Aashiyane Mein

Doosri Koi Ladki Zindagi Mein Aayegi
Kitni Der Lagti Hai Usko Bhool Jaane Mein

st: Udas Raat Hai Koi To Khawab De Jao
s:
Udas Raat Hai Koi To Khawab De Jao
Mere Gilas Mein Thodi Sharab De Jao

Bahut Se Aur Bhi Ghar Hain Khuda Ki Basti Mein
Fakeer Kab Se Khada Hai Jawab De Jao

Main Zard Patton Pe Shabnam Saza Ke Laya Hoon
Kisi Ne Mujhse Kaha Tha Hisaab De Jao

Meri Nazar Mein Rahe Doobne Ka Manzar Bhi
Guroob Hota Hua Aaftaab De Jao

Fir Iske Baad Nazaare Nazar Ko Tarsenge
Vo Ja Raha Hai Khizan Ke Gulab De Jao

Hazar Safhon Ka Deewan Kaun Padhta Hai
Bashir Badr Koi Intekhaab De Jao

st: Nikal Aaye Idhar Janab Kahan
s:
Nikal Aaye Idhar Janab Kahan
Raat Ke Vaqt Aaftab Kahan

Meri Aakhein Kisi Ke Aansoo Hain
Varna In Pathron Mein Aab Kahan

Seb Khile Hain Kisi Ke Gaalon Per
Is Baras Bagh Mein Gulab Kahan

Mere Hothon Pe Teri Khushboo Hai
Chhoo Sakegi Inhe Sharab Kahan

st: Logon Ne Kaha Ki Main Sharabi Hoon,
s:
Logon Ne Kaha Ki Main Sharabi Hoon,
Maine Kaha Unho Ne Ankhon Se Pilaiee Hai.
Logon Ne Kaha Ki Main Ashiq Hoon,
Maine Kaha Ashiqi Unho Ne Sikhaiee Hai.
Logon Ne Kaha Rahul Tu Shayar Dewana Hai,
Maine Kaha Unki Mohabbat Rang Laiee Hai.

st: Meri Kabar Pe Mat Gulaab Leke Aana
s:
Meri Kabar Pe Mat Gulaab Leke Aana
Na Hi Haathon Mein Chiraag Leke Aana
Payasa Hu Main Barso Se Jaanam
Botal Sharab Ki Aur Ek Glass Leke Aana..

st: Hamesha yad ati hai unki..
s:
Hamesha yad ati hai unki..
Aur mood ho jata hai kharab..
Tab Hamesha lekar baithe hai hum…..
ek hath me Kalam aur ek hath me sharab…

st: Ho chuki mulakaat abhi salaam baaki hai
s:
Ho chuki mulakaat abhi salaam baaki hai
Tumhare naam ki do ghoont sharaab baki hai
Tumko mubarak ho khushiyoon ka shamyaana
Mere naseeb me abhi do gaz zameen baki hai…

st: Main todh leta agar gulab hoti,
s:
Main todh leta agar gulab hoti,
mai jawab banta agar sawaal hoti,
sab jante hain mai nasha nahi karta,
Par pee leta agar sharaab hoti…

st: Ek Jahan Maanga Tha Jisme Bahot Saara Pyar Mile,
s:
Ek Jahan Maanga Tha Jisme Bahot Saara Pyar Mile,
Magar De Diya Mehkhana Jahan Bahot Saari Sharab Thi
Ek Kandha Maanga Tha Jiska Mujhe Sahara Mile,
Magar De Di Zindagi Jahan Duniya Bhar Ki Tanhai Thi…

st: Dil Pe Jab Se Sharab Ka Pehra Lag Gaya,
s:
Dil Pe Jab Se Sharab Ka Pehra Lag Gaya,
Gam Ka Andar Aane Ka Raasta Band Ho Gaya
Zubaan Ne Jab Se Sharab Ko Chhu Liya,
Uska Naam Hamesha Ke Liye Bhool Gaya…

st: Khushiyo Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
s:
Khushiyo Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Pyar Ki Mohtaz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Hans Leta Hoo Logo Ko Dikhane Ke Liye,
Warna Dard Ki Kitaab Hai Meri Zindagi…

st: Kabhi aansu kabhi khushi dekhi,
s:
Kabhi aansu kabhi khushi dekhi,
Humne akshar majburi or bekasi dekhi,
Unki naarazgi ko hum kya samjhe,
Humne khud apni taqdeer ki bebasi dekhi…

st: Nasha hum karte hain ,
s:
Nasha hum karte hain ,
ilzaam sharaab ko diya jaata hai,
magar ilzaam sharaab ka nahi unka hai,
jinka chehraa hume har jaam mein nazar aata hai…

st: Wo Bhi Din They Jab Hum Bhi Piya Karte They,
s:
Wo Bhi Din They Jab Hum Bhi Piya Karte They,
Yun Na Karo Hamse Piney Pilaney Ki Baat,
Jitni Tumhare Jaam Mein Hai Sharab,
Utni Hum Paimaney Mein Chod Diya Kartey They…

st: Dard ki mehfil me ek sher hum bhi arz kiya karte hai..
s:
Dard ki mehfil me ek sher hum bhi arz kiya karte hai..
Na kisi se marham Na duaon ki Ummed kiya karte hai..
kayi chehre lekar log yaha jiya karte hai…….
hum in aasunao ko ek chehre ke liye peeya karte hai….

st: Hamesha yad ati hai unki..
s:
Hamesha yad ati hai unki..
Aur mood ho jata hai kharab..
Tab Hamesha lekar baithe hai hum…..
ek hath me Kalam aur ek hath me sharab…

st: Yaaro ki Mehfil Aise Jamai Jati Hai
s:
Yaaro ki Mehfil Aise Jamai Jati Hai
Kholane se Pehle Botal Hilaayi Jati Hai
Fir Awaz Lgayi Jati Hai
Aa Jao Tute DiL Walo
Yaha Dard-E-DiL Ki Dawa Pilayi jati hai!

st: Kuch log peete hain gam bhoolane ko……
s:
Kuch log peete hain gam bhoolane ko……
kuch log peete hain koi aur gam bhoolaane ko….
par ai dost ye kya………
hum to mahoal na milane ke gam mein peete hain…..

st: Tum Haseen Ho Gulab Jaisi Ho
s:
Tum Haseen Ho Gulab Jaisi Ho
Bahut Nazuk Ho Khawab Jaisi Ho
Dil ki dhadkan main aag lagati ho
Hothon Se Lagakar Pee Jayoon Tumhe
Sir Se Paanv Tak Sharab Jaisi Ho…

st: Peene Pilane Ki Kya Baat Karte Ho,
s:
Peene Pilane Ki Kya Baat Karte Ho,
Kabhi Hum Bhi Piya Karte The,
Jitni Tum Jaam Mein Liye Baithe Ho,
Utni Hum Paimaane Mein Chod Diya Karte The…

st: Pi Hai Sharab Har Gali Ki Dukan Se,
s:
Pi Hai Sharab Har Gali Ki Dukan Se,
Dosti Si Ho Gayi Hai Sharab Ki Jam Se,
Gujre Hai Hum Kuch Aise Mukam Se,
Ki Aankhen Bhar Aati Hai Mohabbat Ke Nam Se..

st: Har Baat ka Koi Jawab Nahi Hota…
s:
Har Baat ka Koi Jawab Nahi Hota…
Har Ishq ka Naam Kharab Nahi Hotaaa..
Yuh to Joom Lete Hai Nashe me Pine Wale
Magar Har Nashe ka Naam Sharab Nahi Hota…

st: Peetay They Sharab Hum,
s:
Peetay They Sharab Hum,
Usne Chudadi Apni Kasam Dekar,
Mehfil Me Gaye The Hum,
Yaroon Ne Piladi Uski Kasam Dekar…

st: Kuch is terha guzarti ab, humaari har shaam hai,
s:
Kuch is terha guzarti ab, humaari har shaam hai,
Ek haath tasveer unki to, aik haath jaam hai!
Bekaar hai yaad dilana ,k shaye ye haraam hai,
Sab kuch bhool jaate hain ,jab koi leta unka naam hai!
Hum to yehi kahenge, Mai be-wajah badnaam hai,
Dard-e-dil se humko to , pahunchaati ye araam hai!
Tabaah kerti hai sharaab, ghalat is per ilzaam hai,
Madadgaar ka badnaam hona to, qudrat ka nizaam hai!
Hum ghamkhaaron ka mai ko, Tah-e-dil se salaam hai,
Bina iske to khudaa jaane, kya humara anjaam hai!

st: Har taraf khamoshi ka saya hai,
s:
Har taraf khamoshi ka saya hai,
Zindagi me pyaar kisne paya hai,
Hum yaadon mein jhoomte hai uski aur zamana kehta hai,
“Dekho aaj phir peekar aaya hai.”

st: Gham tum laate ho zindagi mein humaare,
s:
Gham tum laate ho zindagi mein humaare,
wo zakhm aane he nahi deti,
khushi ko to ek pal mein bikher dete ho tum humaari,
wo to khushi ko jaane he nahi deti,
hosh mein laa-laa kar tum hosh udaati ho humaare,
wo sharaab to hosh mein aane he nahi deti…

st: Teri aankhon se yoon to saagar bhi piye hain maine,
s:
Teri aankhon se yoon to saagar bhi piye hain maine,
Tujhe kya khabar judaai ke din kaise jiye hain maine…

st: Jaam pe jaam pine se kya fayda
s:
Jaam pe jaam pine se kya fayda
Shaam ko pee subah utar jayegi…
Are 2 boond mere pyar ki pee le,
Zindagi sari nashe me he gujar jayegi…

st: Peeta Tha Sharab mai,
s:
Peeta Tha Sharab mai,
Usne Chudadi Apni Kasam Dekar…
Mehfil Me Gaya Tha mai,
Yaroon Ne Piladi Uski Kasam Dekar…

st: maykhana na milla to kyu  tarsta hai shrabi,
s:
maykhana na milla to kyu  tarsta hai shrabi,

jaam tujhe hum pilla denge.

bus farak itna hoga ki ,

kanch k pemane ki jagah ,

husan ki nigahe hongi.

st: Ye jo peene pilane ki baat karte hai,
s:
Ye jo peene pilane ki baat karte hai,
unse keh do kabhi hum bhi piya karte the,
jitni piker ye bahak jate hai,
utni to hum gilaso me chhod diya karte the…

st: Teri Yaad Ne Hamhe Jeene Na Diya;
Sharaab Dard Ki Dawa Hai
s:
Sharaab Dard Ki Dawa Hai
Peene Se Koi Kharabi Nahi
Dil Ke Dard Se Peete Hain
Waise Hum Sharaabi Nahi…

st: Dil ke dard se bada koi dard nahin hota..
s:
Dil ke dard se bada koi dard nahin hota..
Aashiqon ka sharab ke siva koi humdard nahin hota..
Aur jb dil toot ta hai to aansu unke bhi nikalte hain..
Jo kehte hain ki “mard ko dard nahin hota..

st: Raat Chup Chap Hai Par Chand Khamosh Nahi,
s:
Raat Chup Chap Hai Par Chand Khamosh Nahi,
Kaise Kah Doon K Aaj Phir Hosh Nahi,
Aisa Dooba Hoon Main Tumhari Aakhon Mein,
Haat Mein Jaam Hai Par Pine Ka Hosh Nahi….!!!

st: Sharab Sareer Ko Khatam Krti Hai
s:
Sharab Sareer Ko Khatam Krti Hai
Sharab Samaj Ko Khatam Krti Hai,
Aao Aaj Is Sharab Ko Khatam Krte Hain,
Ek Bottle Tum Khtam Kro,
Ek Bottle Hum Khatam Krte Hai. ..

st: Main todh leta agar gulab hoti,
s:
Main todh leta agar gulab hoti,
mai jawab banta agar sawaal hoti,
sab jante hain mai nasha nahi karta,
Par pee leta agar sharaab hoti…

st: Ho chuki mulakaat abhi salaam baaki hai
s:
Ho chuki mulakaat abhi salaam baaki hai
Tumhare naam ki do ghoont sharaab baki hai
Tumko mubarak ho khushiyoon ka shamyaana
Mere naseeb me abhi do gaz zameen baki hai…

st: Hamesha yad ati hai unki..
s:
Hamesha yad ati hai unki..
Aur mood ho jata hai kharab..
Tab Hamesha lekar baithe hai hum…..
ek hath me Kalam aur ek hath me sharab…

st: Meri Kabar Pe Mat Gulaab Leke Aana
s:
Meri Kabar Pe Mat Gulaab Leke Aana
Na Hi Haathon Mein Chiraag Leke Aana
Payasa Hu Main Barso Se Jaanam
Botal Sharab Ki Aur Ek Glass Leke Aana..

st: Logon Ne Kaha Ki Main Sharabi Hoon,
s:
Logon Ne Kaha Ki Main Sharabi Hoon,
Maine Kaha Unho Ne Ankhon Se Pilaiee Hai.
Logon Ne Kaha Ki Main Ashiq Hoon,
Maine Kaha Ashiqi Unho Ne Sikhaiee Hai.
Logon Ne Kaha Rahul Tu Shayar Dewana Hai,
Maine Kaha Unki Mohabbat Rang Laiee Hai.

st: Mere Dil Mein Na Aao Varna Doob Jaaoge,
s:
Mere Dil Mein Na Aao Varna Doob Jaaoge,
Gham E Ashkon Ke Shiwa Kuchh Bhi Nahi Andar,

Agar Ek Bar Risne Laga Jo Paani,
Toh Kam Pad Jaayega Bharne Ke Liye Samander…

st: Mera Sahara Toh Sharab Ka Pyala Hai,
s:
Mera Sahara Toh Sharab Ka Pyala Hai,
Jakhmon Ne Mujhe Dard Dekar Pala Hai,

Thokar Marker Giraya Khusi Ne Mujhe,
Toh Haath Badhakar Ghamon Ne Sambhala Hai…

st: Dil Ki Zalan Mitane Ke Liye,
s:
Dil Ki Zalan Mitane Ke Liye,
Tere Sitam Bhulane Ke Liye,

Peete Hain Sharab Teri Yaad Mein Hum,
Warna Lakhon Hain Ghar Basaane Ke Liye….

st: Gurur Us Pe Bahut Sajda Hai Magar Kah Do,
s:
Gurur Us Pe Bahut Sajda Hai Magar Kah Do,
Isi Mein Uska Bhala Hai Gurur Kam Kar De,

Yahan Libas Ki Kimat Hai Aadmi Ki Nahin,
Mujhe Gilash Bada De Sharab Kam Kar De,

Chamkne Wali Hai Tahrir Meri Kismat Ki,
Koi Chirag Ki Lo Ko Jara Sa Kam Kar De,

Kisi Ne Choom Ke Aankhon Ko Yeh Dua Di Hai,
Jamin Teri Khuda Motiyon Se Nam Kar De…

st: Uska Andaaj Hi Kuchh Dusre Hisab Ka Hai,
s:
Uska Andaaj Hi Kuchh Dusre Hisab Ka Hai,
Adhura Sa Galat Bayan Is Kitaab Ka Hai,

Saamne Uske Thahrate Nahin Khuda Tere,
Tinke Tinke Mein Rang Uske Aaftab Ka Hai,

Tere Maykhane Sareaam Se Khali Khali,
Surur Aur Hi Us Kudrati Sharab Ka Hai,

Dekhte Ho Jo Chamkati Huyi Cheejo Mein Chamak,
Yeh Toh Chhota Sa Namuna Usi Sabab Ka Hai,

Kabhi Barsati Ghatayen Toh Kabhi Angaare,
Maajra Uske Gire Ya Uthe Nakaab Ka Hai…

st: Jo Ghadi Eish Mein Gujre,
s:
Jo Ghadi Eish Mein Gujre,
Woh Gaminat Jaano,
Jindgaani Ka Meri,
Jaan Bharosa Kya Hai,

st: Nasha hum karte hain ,
s:
Nasha hum karte hain ,
ilzaam sharaab ko diya jaata hai,
magar ilzaam sharaab ka nahi unka hai,
jinka chehraa hume har jaam mein nazar aata hai…

st: Kabhi aansu kabhi khushi dekhi,
s:
Kabhi aansu kabhi khushi dekhi,
Humne akshar majburi or bekasi dekhi,
Unki naarazgi ko hum kya samjhe,
Humne khud apni taqdeer ki bebasi dekhi…

st: Khushiyo Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
s:
Khushiyo Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Pyar Ki Mohtaz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Hans Leta Hoo Logo Ko Dikhane Ke Liye,
Warna Dard Ki Kitaab Hai Meri Zindagi…

st: Ek Jahan Maanga Tha Jisme Bahot Saara Pyar Mile,
s:
Ek Jahan Maanga Tha Jisme Bahot Saara Pyar Mile,
Magar De Diya Mehkhana Jahan Bahot Saari Sharab Thi
Ek Kandha Maanga Tha Jiska Mujhe Sahara Mile,
Magar De Di Zindagi Jahan Duniya Bhar Ki Tanhai Thi…

st: Dard ki mehfil me ek sher hum bhi arz kiya karte hai..
s:
Dard ki mehfil me ek sher hum bhi arz kiya karte hai..
Na kisi se marham Na duaon ki Ummed kiya karte hai..
kayi chehre lekar log yaha jiya karte hai…….
hum in aasunao ko ek chehre ke liye peeya karte hai…

st: Har Baat ka Koi Jawab Nahi Hota…
s:
Har Baat ka Koi Jawab Nahi Hota…
Har Ishq ka Naam Kharab Nahi Hotaaa..
Yuh to Joom Lete Hai Nashe me Pine Wale
Magar Har Nashe ka Naam Sharab Nahi Hota…

st: Tum Haseen Ho Gulab Jaisi Ho
s:
Tum Haseen Ho Gulab Jaisi Ho
Bahut Nazuk Ho Khawab Jaisi Ho
Dil ki dhadkan main aag lagati ho
Hothon Se Lagakar Pee Jayoon Tumhe
Sir Se Paanv Tak Sharab Jaisi Ho…

st: Roshni karta hu andhera mitane ke liye,
s:
Roshni karta hu andhera mitane ke liye,
Sharab pita hu main tujko bhulane ke liye,
Kyo na ban saki tum meri zindagi ki mehbooba,
Aaj bhi rota hu main gujre zamane ke liye.

st: Log peete hai sharab mehkhane ja-ja kar,
s:
Log peete hai sharab mehkhane ja-ja kar,
jo do pal mein utar jayegi,
humne to pee hai apne mehboob ki aankho se,
jo umar bhar naa utar payegi.

st: Apni hi garaj se jee rahe hai jo log,
s:
Apni hi garaj se jee rahe hai jo log,
apni hi kbaye see rahe hai jo log,
unko bhi hai kya sharab peene se gurej,
insaan ka khoon pee rahe hai jo log.

st: Mausum Bhi Hai Sharab Bhi Hai
s:
Mausum Bhi Hai Sharab Bhi Hai
Pehlu Mein Wo Ishq Mehtab Bhi Hai
Duniya Mein Ab Aur Chaiye Kya Mujhko,
Shaaki Bhi Hai Saj Bhi Hai Sharrab Bhi Hai.

st: Dil Bana To aap Deewane Bane,
s:
Dil Bana To aap Deewane Bane,
Sharab Bani To Mekhane Bane,
Kuch To Baat Hai Aap Mein Bhi,
Yui To Nahi hum pagal Bane.

st: Zakham Has Kar Gulab Ho Jaate,
s:
Zakham Has Kar Gulab Ho Jaate,
aur Fir Lajawab Ho Jaate,
Tera Daman Na Mil Saka mujhe,
Warna Mere Aansu kb ke Sharab Ho Jate.

st: Mausam bhi hai, umar bhi, shabab bhi hai,
s:
Mausam bhi hai, umar bhi, shabab bhi hai,
Pehlo mein wo rashk-e-mahtaab bhi hai,
Duniya mein ab or chaiye kya mujh ko,
Saaqi bhi hai saaz bhi hai or sharab bhi hai.

st: Nashe Mein Jeene Ka Maja Aata Hai,
s:
Nashe Mein Jeene Ka Maja Aata Hai,
Unki Aankho Se Peene Ka Maja Aata Hai,
Sharab Ki Bottle Ki Tarah Lagti Hai Wo,
Use Puri Pee Jaane Ko jee chahta Hai.

st: Peene do sharab abhi to shaam baaki hai,
s:
Peene do sharab abhi to shaam baaki hai,
aye yaar tere naam ka bhi ek jaam baaki hai,
jaana aye ladkhadate hue maikhane se,
peene do abhi to kadmo mein jaan baaki hai.

st: Nasha Jaruri Hai Zindagi ke Liye,
s:
Nasha Jaruri Hai Zindagi ke Liye,
Sirf Sharab Hi kaafi Nahi Hai Bekhudi Ke Liye,
Kisi Ki Mast Nigahon Me Doob Jao ek dafa,
Bada Haseen Samunder Hai Khudkhushi Ke Liye.

st: Har Phool Gulab ka Nahi Hota,
s:
Har Phool Gulab ka Nahi Hota,
Har Jaam Sharab ka Nahi Hota,
jara Sambhalkar Chalna Mere Dost,
Har Dost Meri Tarah Wafadar Nahi Hota.

st: Koi peeta hai nasha chadhane ke liye,
s:
Koi peeta hai nasha chadhane ke liye,
Koi peeta hai gham bhulane ke liye,
Na jaane kyu duniya kehti hai sharab ko bura,
Sharabi to ise peeta hai bas gam bulane ke liye.

st: Pilana farz tha to kuch bhi pila diya hota,
s:
Pilana farz tha to kuch bhi pila diya hota,
Sharab kam thi to paani mila diya hota,
zuban pe sharm-o-haya ka pehra tha,
To muskura ke sar hi hila diya hota.

Ye shayari likhna unka kaam nahi,
Jinke dil aankhon mein basa karte hai,
Shayari toh wo mushroof saksh likhte hai,
Jo sharab se nahi, kalam se nasha karte hai.

st: Teri aankhon se aisi sharab pee maine,
s:
Teri aankhon se aisi sharab pee maine,
Ke phir na kabhi hosh ka dawa kiya kabhi maine,
Wo aur honge jinhe maut aa gayi hogi,
Nigah-e-yaar se paayi hai zindagi maine.

st: phir aansoo ke kuch fasane nikle,
s:
phir aansoo ke kuch fasane nikle,
maikhane se sharab ke paimane nikle,
jo dil ka haal hamara samajh na paaye,
kyu unko hum apne zakhm dikhane nikle.

st: jo manzil tak pahunch jaaye wo musafir hi kya,
s:
jo manzil tak pahunch jaaye wo musafir hi kya,
jo pee ke behak jaaye wo sharabi hi kya,
chal kadam-dar-kadam mere sath uss jahan tak,
jo thak gaya safar mein to wo hamsafar hi kya.

st: Beete hue kal ke kisse yaad rakhte hai,
s:
Beete hue kal ke kisse yaad rakhte hai,
tute hue dil ke hisse paas rakhte hai,
mujhe shayar se sharabi banane wale dost,
hum tere tute jaam ke seeshe bhi sath rakhte hai.

st: Zindagi ke sawalo ka jawab dhundta hoon,
s:
Zindagi ke sawalo ka jawab dhundta hoon,
dard ko kam kar sake wo sharab dhundta hoon,
waqt ke haatho majboor ek shaks hoon main,
jo jeene ka de bahana wo kitaab dhundta hoon.
